name: Mr. Psychologist
description:
When a person communicates with another, he begins to unconsciously copy his behavior. Psychologists and psychiatrists, helping their patients, can also deviate from normal behavior. 
And now the phone is ringing. Again . . .  
Pick it up and delay your madness, or dive in and help the patient? Is madness inevitable?

How to play

When playing Mr. Psychologist you get calls from your patients, when you pick up the phone you are presented with 4 choices, each will contribute towards your own mental health. Choose your answers wisely, or you will inevitably die. You can see your mental state represented through the portrait on the wall.
